content: Am I the only one who would try to say “We have no chance. I mean, I’d be really embarrassed if I were them and let us within 20 points. They have the last two league MVPs and had four All-Stars this year, we dont have any. Frankly, it’s a miracle we’re in the playoffs.” Then, if you get a game early, maybe they start pressing, like, “Man, we’re so much better than these guys, how could we have lost?” I just know this strategy really pisses people off when you play pickup ball and apologize for making shots, like you can’t believe you’re getting so lucky.
